document_data.name: The Chief's Rest
document_data.mainbody: '''The Chief's Rest''' was a luxurious inn located in the city of [[Lheshayl]] on the [[Shining Plains]].
document_data.Services: As of the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Chief's Rest was the most extensive inn in Lheshayl. Reportedly, it catered to wealthy traveler's every desire.
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Adamar Session]], [[Bard]] of [[Starmantle]], visited yhe Chief's Rest inn during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. The establishment was advertised in the bard's guide to the [[Vilhon Reach]].
